original_title: Holy Time in Eternity, Holy Eternity in Time
overview: The county of Yoknapatawpha cannot be found with the aid of maps; it is the invention of the American author William Faulkner, and the setting of his classic novels. Tracing its tracks into the present, Elise Florenty & Marcel TÃ¼rkowsky conjure a vanished landscape, saturated in its sultry atmosphere and eidetic visions.
title: Holy Time in Eternity, Holy Eternity in Time
